definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Go see it-I guarantee it'll knock your socks off!
sentences.chinese: 你得去看看，保证会让你激动万分的。

sentences.english: Nature must be gladsome when I was so happy.
sentences.chinese: 当我欣喜万分的时候，大自然也一定非常高兴。

sentences.english: His sunken cheeks slowly reddened and burned with miserable shame.
sentences.chinese: 他羞愧万分，凹陷的面颊上慢慢地透出了红色。

sentences.english: Week -long national day is coming. I'm looking forword to seeing Yun who was my good classmate at college.
sentences.chinese: 十一长假即将来临，万分期待着大学同学赟的到来。

sentences.english: Hopefully you don't give us too much of a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 对于这样的好事，万分希望您别让我们好过头。

sentences.english: One group ate food with 0.3 parts per million (ppm) methylmercury, which most U.
sentences.chinese: 第一组吃的食物中，甲基水银含量是千万分之三。

sentences.english: I really appreciate it if you could give this position to me.
sentences.chinese: 如果能够提供这份工作给我，我将万分感激。

sentences.english: Her boyfriend had left her, and she was in great pain.
sentences.chinese: 她男朋友离她而去，使她痛苦万分。

sentences.english: The mother thanked him gratefully while inserting her entrance card.
sentences.chinese: 那位母亲万分感激，插入她的门卡。

sentences.english: People were standing around him and laughing, his mother was standing there in agony.
sentences.chinese: 围观的众人嘲笑他，他的母亲痛苦万分。

sentences.english: He felt completely daunted by the difficulties that faced him.
sentences.chinese: 面临众多困难，他感觉万分沮丧。

sentences.english: There was no time to lose, and no time to discuss the matter with the family.
sentences.chinese: 情况紧急，危急万分，没有时间与家人商量了。

sentences.english: Words can not express how much I appreciate this honor.
sentences.chinese: 言语表达不了我对此荣誉的万分感激。

sentences.english: Of this disease in China is 500 ten-thousandth of the probability of occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病在我国的发生概率为500万分之一。

sentences.english: I'm grateful for your hospitality and the hospitality of the people of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 我对在座的各位和埃及人民的热情款待万分感激。

definition: to feel even more/to be extremely (sad, lonely, delighted etc)
one's whole heart/from the bottom of one's heart
in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
to exhibit one's feelings in one's speech
